mapper.select:
select tppp.*, tppd.prod_category1st_code, tppd.prod_category1st_name, tppd.prod_category2nd_code, tppd.prod_category2nd_name, tppd.prod_category_name, tppd.prod_category_code, tppd.dimension_id, tppd.dimension_name, tppd.dimension_code, tppd.dimension_value from t_planning_project_plank as tppp left join t_planning_project_dimension as tppd on tppd.id = tppp.planning_project_dimension_id where tppp.del_flag = '0'
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
